articles.description: This year, South industry gave us some brilliant films and we're looking forward to their 2024 film collection. From Mahesh Babu's Guntur Kaaram to Suriya's Kanguva, here's the list of all films which are going to hit the screens in 2024.
articles.content: The follow-up movie, narrating the tale of YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, the present Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, is scheduled to hit theatres on February 8, 2024.

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: BTS' V has the sweetest surprise for fans on his birthday, drops video. Watch - Hindustan Times
articles.description: BTS' V aka Kim Taehyung turned a year older. As he is spending his special day, away from fans, friends and family in the military, here's a sweet video of him.
articles.content: BTS fans aka ARMY thought this year they would miss out on seeing their favourite, Kim Taehyung aka V, celebrating his birthday as he is enlisted in the military. V turned 28 on Saturday. On the spec… [+2953 chars]
